name: Anton Extensions
author: Anthony Carbon

sections.description:
Anton Extensions has PHP coding SOP fuction that prevent errors, list of addons that may suitable for your site requirements, and many more free features that you might love. This plugin is can integrate with Gravity Forms, Override WordPress default emails, login landing page, and more.

FREE Features

  • Manage wp-login.php login landing page. Override the default WordPress layout, logo and permalink. DEMO
  • Override the WordPress email subject name and email using general settings name and email address.
  • Turn your Gravity Form activation page into popup layout with admin settings.
  • Override the WordPress new user registration subject name ([%s] New User Registration).
  • Disable/Enable input auto fill or autocomplete.
  • Fix Gravity Forms Uncaught TypeError: grecaptcha.render

Addons

  • Gravity Forms Media Upload Field – add custom field that can upload image with prefered dimension, save to media dashboard.
  • WP Print – Customized your post, page, or custom post-type print layout without doing any back-end coding.

Related plugins

Anthony Carbon Plugins

Develop by

anthonycarbon.com – WordPress Developer / Programmer

Happy coding everyone :D.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Anton Extensions menu in your dashboard.
sections.faq:
Why do we have to use this plugin

Because it is cool.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Let’s see what’s missing on this plugin an I start with you.

1.0.4

  • Add upload user features.

1.0.6

  • Add media upload plugin addon for gravity forms.

1.0.9

  • Fix color picker admin error.
  • Add text title options on wp-login.php.

1.1.0

  • Add Gravity Form activation settings.

1.1.1

  • fix active tab settings onload.

1.1.4

  • update development-fuctions.php version 0.5 .

1.1.5

  • update development-fuctions.php version 0.7, add multiple key for wpkeyvalue.

1.1.6

  • add custom css on wp-login.php field.

1.1.7

  • update development-fuctions.php version 0.9.
  • fix gravity form activation first load white space error.

1.1.8

  • Fix Uncaught TypeError: grecaptcha.render is not a function error. If the error is still not fix, make sure to update the plugin. This is working on Gravity Forms 2.3.1 and above.

1.1.9

  • Disable/Enable input auto fill or autocomplete

1.2.0

  • Fix Warning: call_user_func_array() expects parameter 1 to be a valid callback, function ‘ae_init_action’ not found or invalid function name error.

1.2.1

  • update development-functions.php to 0.1.1
  • wpkeyvalue results order
  • add .min in all assets and remove comment code
